title: Client stuck after game ended....
body: I just finished an Invasion play through, but the client for some reason thinks I'm still in the game. I've already tried reloging and no dice.

replies.body:
These ghost games have been plaguing a good amount of players over the past 2 days. It seems like most of them have been starting to clear up, and a few hours seems to be enough time for most games to finally finish.

Have you been able to get back into any games yet?
